heading: HR01731
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON TOURISM, ECOLOGY, HEALTH, NATURAL RESOURCES AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED OVERCROWDING, OVERDEVELOPMENT AND IRRESPONSIBLE WASTE MANAGEMENT BY SOME ESTABLISHMENTS IN THE ISLAND OF BORACAY IN MALAY, AKLAN WITH THE END IN VIEW OF SUSTAINING ITS NATURAL BEAUTY AND PRESERVING ITS STATUS AS A TOP GLOBAL DESTINATION
status: Pending with the Committee on TOURISM since 2018-03-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01731
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON TOURISM, ECOLOGY, HEALTH, NATURAL RESOURCES AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED OVERCROWDING, OVERDEVELOPMENT AND IRRESPONSIBLE WASTE MANAGEMENT BY SOME ESTABLISHMENTS IN THE ISLAND OF BORACAY IN MALAY, AKLAN WITH THE END IN VIEW OF SUSTAINING ITS NATURAL BEAUTY AND PRESERVING ITS STATUS AS A TOP GLOBAL DESTINATION
